title: LLM Integration
description: The LLM Integration feature leverages advanced language models (LLMs) to provide powerful conversational AI capabilities and code-related assistance.
acceptance_criteria: The backend application is configured to interact with an LLM service (e.g., Google Gemini, OpenAI GPT-3).
Users can send natural language prompts to the LLM through the chat interface.
The LLM provides responses to user prompts, generating text, code, or other relevant information.
The backend application handles token count for LLM interactions, providing accurate information to users.
The backend application supports chunking of LLM responses, allowing for streaming of large responses to the frontend.
The LLM integration handles errors gracefully, providing appropriate feedback to the user in case of LLM failures or API limitations.
The backend application can be configured to switch between different LLM models, allowing for flexibility in choosing the most suitable model for the task.
